name: Tetris (itch) (PlainCrown)
description:
Basic tetris clone with a few tweaks and additional features. Made in Godot 3.1. This is an unfinished project in the middle of development, however the base game is complete and already playable.

Missing features coming soon:

  • Game over screen
  • Controls page in main menu
  • Sound effects
  • Working cleared line counters

If you'd like to contribute or check out the source code, visit https://github.com/PlainCrown/tetris
